segments.text: Yes , emergency . There is a huge fire here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Calm down , sir . What's your name and where are you now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My name is Jerry and we are on the intersection of West Road and East Road .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sir , leave the house if the fire draws any closer to your house . Our men will be over in 5 minutes .
segments.speaker: S2
